com.jmex.physics.joints
Class Joint

java.lang.Object
  com.jmex.physics.joints.Joint
Direct Known Subclasses:
BallJoint, Hinge2Joint, HingeJoint
public abstract class Joint
extends java.lang.Object

A superclass Joint. It is used to initialise all the joints and obtain the ODE representation of joints from. This class should never be used by the user explicitly and they should use one of its subclasses.

Author:
Ahmed

Constructor Detail

Joint

public Joint(java.lang.String name,
             int type,
             DynamicPhysicsObject obj1,
             DynamicPhysicsObject obj2)
The constructor for the joint. It takes the type of joint, and the two objects that should be connected. This is good for things like car suspensions

Parameters:
type -
obj1 -
obj2 -
Method Detail

attach

public void attach()
Perform the attachment and attach the two objects.

Note: This operation must be performed before any parameters are set. Otherwise, unexpected behaviour from the objects can arrise.

delete

public void delete()
Delete the joint and let the two objects go freely.
